title: Celtics Take Game 1
description:
Tony Kornheiser and J. A. Adande discuss the Celtics winning Game 1 of the NBA Finals after a 4th quarter comeback on the road against the Warriors, Adam SIlver’s idea of making the All-NBA Team position-less, and the Phillies firing Joe Girardi after a 22-29 start. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: J. A. Adande joins the show to talk the Celtics taking Game 1 on the road and the Avalanche shutting out the Oilers
